name: Giveaways
description: Reaction based giveaways with customisable embeds, reactions, requirements and much more.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user ids to link them to their hosted giveaways.
install_msg: Thanks for installing Giveaways. Load the cog with `[p]load giveaways` and see all its commands with `[p]help Giveaways`
author: crayyy_zee
